# Microsoft可移植可执行文件和通用目标文件格式文件规范

## 下载

### Docker

```
docker pull apachecn0/microsoft-keyizhi-kezhixingwenjian-he-tongyong-mubiao-wenjiangeshi-wenjian-guifan
docker run -tid -p <port>:80 apachecn0/microsoft-keyizhi-kezhixingwenjian-he-tongyong-mubiao-wenjiangeshi-wenjian-guifan
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### PYPI

```
pip install microsoft-keyizhi-kezhixingwenjian-he-tongyong-mubiao-wenjiangeshi-wenjian-guifan
microsoft-keyizhi-kezhixingwenjian-he-tongyong-mubiao-wenjiangeshi-wenjian-guifan <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### NPM

```
npm install -g microsoft-keyizhi-kezhixingwenjian-he-tongyong-mubiao-wenjiangeshi-wenjian-guifan
microsoft-keyizhi-kezhixingwenjian-he-tongyong-mubiao-wenjiangeshi-wenjian-guifan <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```
